channel.title: Lumen on Siri
channel.description: Recent content in Lumen on Siri

item.title: Part 0: Integrating Nix for CI, Package Management ft. Laravel
item.description: I would like to keep things short and simple so if you do not know about nix i will be listing couple resources to follow and these are the things I will be achieving by the end of this series. Package Laravel using nix Build container image with nix Setup gitlab-runner and run CI with nix Setup a binary cache server Simple Integration Test using testers.runNixOSTest Why nix? I want my production to be running the same runtime dependencies I used during development.
